content: here is a classic throwback from the 1970 s that everyone loves it crochets up quickly making it great for gift-giving this blanket is lightweight and reversible - perfect for babies or adults this pattern is suitable for beginners and includes tips on seamless colour changing **want to know more about granny square blankets of course you do ** here 1 is a great collection of granny square blankets from movies and tv shows and this wonderful article 2 titled *why do tv characters all own the same weird old blanket * **skill level ** **rookie**-apprentice-virtuoso-genius **skills ** chain double_crochet **finished measurements ** approx 35 square 1 http //crochetime net/category/as-seen-on-tv/ 2 http //www slate com/blogs/browbeat/2015/07/06/from_the_big_bang_theory_to_roseanne_to_jane_the_virgin_why_do_tv_characters html
